comment.body: for me, depression is when I can't see a feasible option for a problem (which is just the difference between my perceived reality and my predictions). Based on this, solution could be to re-evaluate either my predictions, or perception; for example, when I can't make progress with something, I've either predicted unrealistic progress, or I just didn't thought about dedicating time to work on, in the early morning / late night / etc.., or I'm spending my time with something not-so important; but that's just an idea :)

I wonder what these people would say / do in case healthcare system runs out of capacity, and they happen to have a medical emergency, call the ambulance, and they say "sorry, we don't have time for new patients"
maybe it's just evolution doing its job :>
lol so this is how the "AI war" starts
